show_time_estimate.label: Show Time Estimate
show_time_estimate.tooltip:
Show a time estimate for when a fate will be completed in minutes and seconds.
This will only appear after some progress has been made.

show_objective_estimate.label: Show Objective Estimate
show_objective_estimate.tooltip:
Show an estimated amount of objectives left (i.e. mob kills) for a fate to be complete.
This will only appear after some progress has been made.

show_fate_type_icon.label: Show Fate Type Icon
show_fate_type_icon.tooltip: Prepend an icon to the fate name indicating the type of fate it is.

show_bonus_fate_icon.label: Show Bonus Fate Icon
show_bonus_fate_icon.tooltip: Prepend an icon to the fate name if it supplies an exp and gemstone bonus.

highlight_selected_fate.label: Highlight Selected Fate
highlight_selected_fate.tooltip: Highlight the current fate with the highest score.

show_preparing_fate_icon.label: Show Preparing Fate Icon
show_preparing_fate_icon.tooltip:
Append an icon to the fate name if it is in the preparing state.
This is the case when an NPC needs to be talked to before it starts or NPCs are moving into place.
